Title: Attack on Titan: Part 1
Genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Horror, Sci-Fi
Writer: Hajime Isayama (manga), Tomohiro Machiyama (screenplay), Yûsuke Watanabe (screenplay), John Burgmeier (head writer), J. Michael Tatum (script adaptation: FUNimation)
Actors: Ashly Burch, Felecia Angelle, Marissa Lenti, Bryce Papenbrook
Plot: In a world where giant humanoid Titans prey on humans, Eren joins the scouting legion to get revenge on the monsters who killed everyone in his town.
